Journals

I am grateful for your interest to learn more about my experiences socially, economically and politically, in the oppressed age of times. By visiting the blog, you agree to respect Scarborough land acknowledgement and access all of its content in the same spirit. Learn more about Scarborough history.

I dedicate all of my journal entries to my daughter Katherine and every child that never returned home from residential schools in Canada through 1830 to 1996.
